isis.stitle: SINGLE REDUCTION, TANDEM AXLE: INTERNATIONAL - PINION POSITION

svcsubsecinfo.para: Ring gears and pinions are supplied in matched sets only. Matching numbers on both the pinion and ring gear are etched for verification. If a new gear set is being used, verify the numbers of each pinion and ring gear before proceeding with assembly (refer to GEAR SET IDENTIFICATION, for location of numbers.)

Pinion position is based on the nominal mounting distance measured from the centerline of the ring gear to the button end of the pinion ( Figure 43). This dimension is controlled by selectively shimming between the pinion cage assembly and the carrier housing. The nominal dimension is 3.976 inches (100.990 mm).

note.para: Be sure mounting surfaces are free of burrs and dirt prior to assembly as they will affect pinion position.
